Summary: Lights gathering into a V then into one & gone
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking due west approx 10:20 pm May 10, 2012 I want to say they were in a geometric form and then gathered together at same altitude forming a V flying West. They gathered closer and closer together as if in line going from the 5 on left 5 on right and one in front gathering closer and closer together til in a line making them all form to one bigger light then Blip gone.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Clinton
There were no other sightings in Clinton on or around May 10th 2012
